# drawerDidOpen(_:)

**Instance Method**

Notifies the delegate that the drawer has opened.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func drawerDidOpen(_ notification: Notification)
```

## Parameters

- **notification**: An [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDrawerDelegate] notification, sent by the default notification center immediately after the drawer has opened.

## Opening and Closing Drawers

- **drawerShouldOpen(_:)**: Asks the delegate if the specified drawer should open.
- **drawerWillOpen(_:)**: Notifies the delegate that the drawer will open.
- **drawerShouldClose(_:)**: Asks the delegate if the specified drawer should close.
- **drawerWillClose(_:)**: Notifies the delegate the drawer will close.
- **drawerDidClose(_:)**: Notifies the delegate that the drawer has closed.
